responses.question: ________ robots are used to automate tasks like picking and packing in storage facilities.

responses.answer_given: Sense and adapt to its environment

Actuators convert mechanical energy into electrical energy.

Automated systems are best suited for:

my_list = [1, 2, 3]
my_list.append(4)
print(my_list)

my_tuple = (10, 20, 30)
print(my_tuple[1])

my_list = [5, 2, 8]
my_list.sort()
print(my_list)

my_list = [1, 2]
my_list.extend([3, 4])
print(my_list)

my_tuple = (1, 2, 3)
my_list = list(my_tuple)
print(my_list)

my_list = [10, 20, 30]
my_list.insert(1, 15)
print(my_list)

my_tuple = (5, 10, 15)
print(len(my_tuple))

my_list = [1, 2, 3, 4]
del my_list[2]
print(my_list)

my_list = [1, 2, 3]
my_tuple = tuple(my_list)
print(my_tuple)

my_list = [3, 1, 4, 1]
print(my_list.index(1))
